section.p: When you start Serna or open a document in Serna, the Serna view is always activated according to a special priority (for details, see and ). When a document is opened with a user-customized view, it is possible to activate the original view.

To restore an original view, take the steps:
Go to View -> Restore View .
In the Restore View Message Box, click Restore .
To learn more about the Restore View Message Box, see .
